sentences.english: There is indication to use Asprin, and it is better to use it.

sentences.english: Meanwhile, we accept and appreciate the criticism and correction of good-will from STAPLES China.

sentences.english: Please kindly point out to me if I said anything improperly.

sentences.english: The article may have some inappropriate parts, please correct them.

sentences.english: Author are responsible for the article seriously, if any omissions, the reader may contact author.

sentences.english: Here's my book. I respectfully request that you point out the mistakes.
Our team is also trying to minimize the number of items pointed out.

sentences.english: Here , the hearty hope gets making a comment of every teacher.

sentences.english: We're to get the speck out of our eye before addressing the faults of others.
sentences.chinese: 在指正他人的缺点前请先除去自己眼里的沙子。

sentences.english: Author bold mean, plans to make a preliminary discussion in light of this, asks respectfully to point out mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 笔者不揣浅陋，拟就此作一初步探讨，敬请指正。

sentences.english: If you must correct someone, don't get personal about it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你一定要指正某人，不要参杂个人因素。

sentences.english: Let us listen to the tape and find out the answers for 1b.

sentences.english: What do I do not place also please more criticism.
